Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Okay lets tackle this problem step by step The user wants me to model a complex hospital patient management process as a process tree using the given operators and notation The process has several stages with different activities and decisions First I need to understand the structure of the process Lets break down the steps as described 1 Arrival A at the hospital Then Registration RG Intake Assessment IA Then Triage with TI and TC Then decide between CE or FBP After that theres a loop with SC TM SPT RDT which is a loop Then RDT results lead to another loop with FCE or FBA Then after that AI and NC in concurrency Then FAS and DDI Then BL ICP MRF in concurrency

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
